availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Talbott N. Bryan (Henry County, Kentucky, cabinet maker and pvt 6th KY Inf USA)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, cabinetmaker and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Sophia Stone Bryan in Shelby County, Kentucky, on October 1, 1849. Cabinetmaker in Henry County in 1860. Served in the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from December 24, 1861, to April 27, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 397.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Shelby County Marriages, Film #000259290, p. 758.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 202.
